Select a category from the left to begin.

Official Wiki.description: Click 'OPEN WIKI' to view the official site.

Discord Support.description: Join Discord for help and create tickets for technical issues.

Spreadsheet Data.description: Entropia_Notes.xlsx contains additional detailed stats, Royal rolls, and dungeon specifics.

New Players.description: Essential guides for starting your journey.

1. Initial Setup.description: Steps to take immediately upon creating characters.

Account Setup.Buffer 1: Force Master (Level to 175, park in collector field)
Account Setup.Buffer 2: Seraph (Skip if Tank is already Seraph)

First Steps.1: Vote for server (up to 5x daily) for Vote Points
First Steps.3: Join a Party (L) with full buffs
First Steps.4: Use /buff command near buffers in collector fields
First Steps.5: Buy 1 Day Premium from Vote Shop
First Steps.6: Propose to alt character (Press O) for stats

Easter Island (Lvl 1).5: Kill Aibatt -> Change Class to Magician

Mars Mine (60-90).Strategy: Kill Bangs outside dungeon. Do not enter.

Saint Morning (90).Action: Buy best NPC gear (~10m Penya budget). Look for Angel/Elder gear.

Halloween Village (90-121).1: Equip new skills to Action Slot

5. Platinum 1-5.Method: Use Blue Platinum Scroll, Teleport to Entropia Tower
5. Platinum 1-5.Gear Prep: Awake Shiny Gear with INT/Cast% using Penya
5. Platinum 1-5.Tip: Platinum 3 area is great for early Penya farming

Shopping Trip.Dominik (Pet): Hatch Eggs for INT Fox -> Level to S
Shopping Trip.Charlie (Housing): Buy INT/ATK Furniture -> Place in House (Y)
Shopping Trip.Smiths: Buy 4x 7% ATK Cards, 10x Water A Cards

Preparation.Weapons: Buy 2x Shiny Staffs from Charly (1 for backup/fusion)
Preparation.Upgrades: Upgrade to +10, use Scrolls of INT

Dungeons.Les Britannia: Kill monsters, use Holy Scrolls. Arcanists can kite boss.
Dungeons.Rewards: Buy missing gear from NPC Dren

8. Platinum 41-50.Note: Old EXP Power-ups stop working here.
8. Platinum 41-50.Tasks: Check Smith exchanges, run Dungeons, Farm Penya in Oasis.

Equipment Progression.description: Follow these stages in order to progress effectively.

Stage 0: Starter.description: Level 1-60. Basic gear provided by the game.

Stage 1: Shiny.description: Platinum 1-50. The foundation of endgame gear.

Weapon (Shiny).Element: Required (except Mage). Use Water A/7% Cards.
Weapon (Shiny).Diamonds: Insert at Jewel Exchanger Peach (Never fails)

Stage 1: Shiny.Accessories: Shiny Accessory Set (Unlock at P30, P40, P50)

Weapon (Black).Merging: Requires 'Scroll of Weapon Merge'. KEEPS Upgrade/Cards. LOSES Diamonds.

Armor (Black).Merging: CRITICAL: Use 'Scroll of Armour Merge (Special)' to KEEP Awakenings.

Utilities.Craftables: Ancient Aura, Powerup, Balloon, Fairy (Alchemy NPC)

Keys & Pets.Warning: Dying in Venux deletes quest items!

Weapon (Soulreaver).Merging: Scroll from Raziel. Merges from Black Weapon.

Armor (Soulreaver).Merging: Scroll from Soran. Only merge GOOD parts (expensive!).

Stage 3: Soulreaver.Fashion: Gaia Set (Gaia Dungeon). Upgrades from Black Dragon.

Sacrifice System.Usage: Create Trance Mode, Royal Accessories, Omega Upgrades

Stage 4: Ultimate Utilities.description: Pre/Early Royal. Quality of Life items.
Stage 4: Ultimate Utilities.Source: Premium Dungeon or Player Shops (No donation needed)

Equipment.Note: Does NOT require merging. Direct drop.

Dungeons.description: Guides and drops for all instances.

Les Britannia (P35+).Tips: Kite boss, buy extra parts from Dren.

Awakening.Usage: Add stats to gear. Use Special Merge scroll to keep these on Black gear.

F-Tool.Setup: Put 'Attack Selected' in Slot 1. Check box 1.

Currencies.ECP (Entropia Chip Perin): From leveling to P50. Buys Weapons & Fashion.
Currencies.Penya: Main currency. Farm in Platinum 37 or Oasis.
Currencies.Dungeon Coins: From Dungeons. Buys Gear & Ultra Protects.

Platinum Tips.1: P3 is good for early Penya.
Platinum Tips.2: P37 is best Penya until Oasis.

Common Mistakes.1: Using Normal Merge scroll on Black Armor (Loses Awakes).
Common Mistakes.2: Forgetting to remove Diamonds before merging.
Common Mistakes.3: Skipping Soulreaver gear (You will die in Royal).
Common Mistakes.4: Dying in Venux with keys in inventory.
